entry.name: SpaceMarines/CaptainsShieldDescription
entry.value: Increases the ranged damage reduction of nearby troops.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TacticalPrecisionDescription
entry.value: Removes penalty from firing heavy weapons after movement and treats shooting with rapid fire weapons as if in half range.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/EmpireWithinFlavor
entry.value: I will share my wisdom, afraid not.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/MightOfHeroesDescription
entry.value: Temporary increases hit points, the accuracy and the damage of friendly unit.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/LitanyOfZealDescription
entry.value: Increases movement of target unit and prevents the unit from being targeted by overwatch attacks. The unit also ignores enemy zone of control.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/LitanyOfZealFlavor
entry.value: Bellowing his hatred of the foe, the Chaplain leads his brothers in the wholesale destruction of the enemy.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/RighteousnessDescription
entry.value: Increases adjacent allied units melee attacks.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/RighteousnessFlavor
entry.value: Rejoice! Let the glory of battle envelop us! Let our enemies fear us, for we are the Emperor's wrath!

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TemplarsChargeDescription
entry.value: Temporary increases nearby allied units melee attacks and damage.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TemplarsChargeFlavor
entry.value: We fight to protect the spiritual and physical heart of our Chapter. That, surely, is worth shedding blood.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/CityTier2Description
entry.value: Increases the tile acquisition radius and the invulnerable damage reduction of Fortresses of Redemption.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/FortressOfRedemptionDamageReduction1Flavor
entry.value: Gladius Prime is already proving far more hostile than the Adeptus Administratum's worst forecasts. With the Fortress' physical defenses under almost constant assault, the Techmarines approve installation of a void shield. Once constructed, this shimmering dome of power is sufficient to warp away the firepower of entire battalions (or even a rogue Imperial Knight) before collapsing.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/FortressOfRedemptionDamageReduction2Flavor
entry.value: Gladius Prime is already proving far more hostile than the Adeptus Administratum's worst forecasts. With the Fortress' physical defenses under almost constant assault, the Techmarines approve installation of a void shield. Once constructed, this shimmering dome of power is sufficient to warp away the firepower of entire battalions (or even a rogue Imperial Knight) before collapsing.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/PredatorLascannonDescription
entry.value: Grants Fortresses of Redemption Twin-Linked Lascannon. Grants Predators and Aquila Macro-Cannons extra Heavy Bolters.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/FortressOfRedemptionDamageReductionDescription
entry.value: Grants Fortresses of Redemption additional Heavy Bolter weapon and armour.

entry.name: VehicleDescription
entry.value: Negates the penalty for heavy and ordnance weapons. Increases the movement penalty in forests and imperial ruins. Missing hit points reduces accuracy and movement.

entry.name: NullZoneDescription
entry.value: Removes invulnerable, witchfire and feel no pain damage reduction.

entry.name: NullZoneFlavor
entry.value: No one is save beside angered Librarian.

entry.name: BodyguardDescription
entry.value: Increases adjacent heroes hero damage reduction

entry.name: HeroDescription
entry.value: Increases the damage reduction of infantry units. Each adjacent infantry unit increases damage reduction by additional 5% (10% for Bodyguard units)
